title: Implement AI service (Python FastAPI)
description: The NestJS backend has an AI module that proxies to a Python FastAPI service, but the actual AI service is not yet implemented. Build the FastAPI service at apps/ai-service/ with: test case generation from requirements/descriptions, BDD scenario generation, coverage gap analysis. Integrate with OpenAI/Anthropic APIs via LangChain.

title: Expand routes.ts constants for all sub-routes
description: constants/routes.ts only defines 16 basic routes but is missing many sub-routes: milestones sub-pages, test run details, requirement details, report sub-pages. Add type-safe route builders for all pages defined in router.tsx.

title: Add backend integration and E2E tests
description: Backend has unit test files but lacks integration tests for API endpoints. Add integration tests covering: auth flow (register/login/refresh), CRUD operations for projects/test-cases/test-runs, report generation, and permission guards. Use NestJS testing utilities with a test database.

title: Commit uncommitted Phase 5 frontend & backend work
description: Large batch of uncommitted work including: new pages (milestones, projects, reports, requirements, settings, test-cases, test-runs, ForgotPassword, ResetPassword), new hooks (useAuth, useDashboard, useSections, useTestCases, useTestExecution, useSessionInit), new API slices (dashboardApi, milestonesApi, requirementsApi, testSuitesApi), feature components, and backend modifications to auth, attachments, requirements, test-cases, users modules.
close_reason: Committed in 4 commits: backend refinements, frontend Phase 6 features, project config/docs, beads config. All pushed to origin/main.

title: Add API rate limiting
description: No rate limiting is currently implemented on the NestJS API. Add throttle guards for sensitive endpoints (auth/login, auth/register, password reset) and general rate limiting for API endpoints using @nestjs/throttler.

title: Replace mock stats in ProjectOverviewPage with real API
description: ProjectOverviewPage uses hardcoded mock statistics. Need to wire it to the existing dashboard API (dashboardApi) to show real project metrics including test execution stats, coverage, recent activity.

title: Add WebSocket support for real-time notifications
description: No real-time update mechanism exists. Add WebSocket gateway (Socket.IO or native WS) for push notifications on test run completion, new test results, and activity feed updates. Frontend already has NotificationsPopover component ready to receive real-time data.

title: Wire settings pages to real API endpoints
description: Settings pages (Profile, Organization, Integrations, Notifications) currently use mock handlers instead of real API calls. Need to connect SettingsPage components to actual backend endpoints for profile updates, org management, integration config, and notification preferences.

title: Set up frontend E2E tests with Playwright
description: No E2E tests exist for the frontend. Set up Playwright with tests for critical user flows: login/register, project creation, test case CRUD, test run execution, and report viewing. Configure CI pipeline integration.

title: Complete detail pages (TestRunDetail, RequirementDetail, ReportViewer)
description: Several detail/viewer pages exist but need full implementation: TestRunDetailPage (show run results, progress, stats), RequirementDetailPage (show requirement with linked test cases and coverage), ReportViewerPage (render specific report types with charts and data). Backend APIs for all these already exist.
close_reason: All three detail pages are already fully implemented: TestRunDetailPage (284 lines, uses useGetTestRunQuery/useGetTestResultsQuery), RequirementDetailPage (391 lines, uses useGetRequirementQuery with link/unlink/delete mutations), ReportViewerPage (477 lines, supports all 4 report types with export). No work needed.
